019package org.jgrapes.http;
020
021import java.time.Duration;
022import java.time.Instant;
023import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
024import java.util.Map;
025import java.util.Map.Entry;
026import java.util.Optional;
027import org.jgrapes.core.Channel;
028import org.jgrapes.http.events.Request;
029
030/**
031 * A in memory session manager. 
032 */
033public class InMemorySessionManager extends SessionManager {
034
035    @SuppressWarnings({ "serial", "PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap" })
036    private final Map<String, Session> sessionsById
037        = new LinkedHashMap<String, Session>(16, 0.75f, true) {
038
039            @Override
040            protected boolean removeEldestEntry(Entry<String, Session> eldest) {
041                if (maxSessions() > 0 && size() > maxSessions()) {
042                    eldest.getValue().close();
043                    return true;
044                }
045                return false;
046            }
047        };
048
049    /**
050     * Creates a new session manager with its channel set to
051     * itself and the path set to "/". The manager handles
052     * all {@link Request} events.
053     */
054    public InMemorySessionManager() {
055        this("/");
056    }
057
058    /**
059     * Creates a new session manager with its channel set to
060     * itself and the path set to the given path. The manager
061     * handles all requests that match the given path, using the
062     * same rules as browsers do for selecting the cookies that
063     * are to be sent.
064     * 
065     * @param path the path
066     */
067    public InMemorySessionManager(String path) {
068        this(Channel.SELF, path);
069    }
070
071    /**
072     * Creates a new session manager with its channel set to
073     * the given channel and the path to "/". The manager handles
074     * all {@link Request} events.
075     * 
076     * @param componentChannel the component channel
077     */
078    public InMemorySessionManager(Channel componentChannel) {
079        this(componentChannel, "/");
080    }
081
082    /**
083     * Creates a new session manager with the given channel and path.
084     * The manager handles all requests that match the given path, using
085     * the same rules as browsers do for selecting the cookies that
086     * are to be sent.
087     *  
088     * @param componentChannel the component channel
089     * @param path the path
090     */
091    public InMemorySessionManager(Channel componentChannel, String path) {
092        this(componentChannel, derivePattern(path), 1000, path);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Creates a new session manager using the given channel and path.
097     * The manager handles only requests that match the given pattern.
098     * The {@link Request} handler is registered with the given priority.
099     * 
100     * This constructor can be used if special handling of top level
101     * requests is needed.
102     *
103     * @param componentChannel the component channel
104     * @param pattern the path part of a {@link ResourcePattern}
105     * @param priority the priority
106     * @param path the path
107     */
108    public InMemorySessionManager(Channel componentChannel, String pattern,
109            int priority, String path) {
110        super(componentChannel, pattern, priority, path);
111    }
112
113    @Override
114    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis",
115        "PMD.AvoidDeeplyNestedIfStmts" })
116    protected Session createSession(String sessionId) {
117        Session session = new InMemorySession(sessionId);
118        Instant now = Instant.now();
119        synchronized (this) {
120            if (absoluteTimeout() > 0) {
121                // Check for sessions that are too old
122                sessionsById.entrySet().removeIf(entry -> {
123                    if (Duration.between(entry.getValue().createdAt(), now)
124                        .getSeconds() > absoluteTimeout()) {
125                        entry.getValue().close();
126                        return true;
127                    }
128                    return false;
129                });
130                if (sessionsById.size() >= maxSessions()) {
131                    // Purge unused
132                    sessionsById.entrySet().removeIf(entry -> {
133                        if (Duration.between(entry.getValue().lastUsedAt(),
134                            now).getSeconds() > idleTimeout()) {
135                            entry.getValue().close();
136                            return true;
137                        }
138                        return false;
139                    });
140                }
141            }
142            sessionsById.put(sessionId, session);
143        }
144        return session;
145    }
146
147    @Override
148    protected Optional<Session> lookupSession(String sessionId) {
149        synchronized (this) {
150            return Optional.ofNullable(sessionsById.get(sessionId));
151        }
152    }
153
154    @Override
155    protected void removeSession(String sessionId) {
156        synchronized (this) {
157            Optional.ofNullable(sessionsById.remove(sessionId))
158                .ifPresent(Session::close);
159        }
160    }
161
162    /*
163     * (non-Javadoc)
164     * 
165     * @see org.jgrapes.http.SessionManager#sessionCount()
166     */
167    @Override
168    protected int sessionCount() {
169        synchronized (this) {
170            return sessionsById.size();
171        }
172    }
173
174}
